archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.5.6: Communications between specialised computing devices should be restricted by applying micro-segmentation at a device level (e.g. permitting medical devices to only communicate with other medical devices).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
